fields.description:
h3. Problem

The value of the row is not being updated after insert a value. It has to be changed the orientation of the device to be updated the value of the row.

h3. Reproducible steps:
 
1.Download the project
http://support-admin.appcelerator.com/files/48ffabce-ee12-11e0-a616-12313819ed80/PM%20Debugging.zip

2.Run the project.

3.Click the first row to update the value, after that watch that the value was not updated then changes the orientation of the device and now the value is updated.

h3. Expected behavior:
Customer wants to update the value of the row after insert a value.

h3. Helpdesk
APP-813869
